title: Update Failed 6.22 Need Help
body: I keep getting Update failed, unspecified error. I've tried running as admin, forcing a repatch, repairing the files, nothing seems to be working for me. Would appreciate any help!

replies.body:
**Same Here

i can't reinstalling game or repair or use beta client or do anything with the game all doesn't work**

> [{quoted}](name=Felicjusz,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MQZ0jJfE,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-11-19T04:06:20.398+0000)
>
> re-installing game works

I have the same problem in euwest and i did re-installing the game but also didnt work still got the same issuse
Anyone else having this problem? after update i cant load the client? a HUGE black screen just pops up thats it
have any of you found a fix? ive tried everything including the dreaded repair button :(
same for me, even tried old fixs such as deleting projects folder and nothing
I am having the same problem too.

It sounds like this failure is happening *after 32%* during patching. If so, this is caused by your patcher not being able to maintain a solid link to our patching servers. Working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will ensure your local network settings are compatible with League and should resolve this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
I believe it is because of the incoming reworks and pre-season updates.
Same here. Anyone has a fix please :)
I have the same problem on the normal client and the alpha client.
As usual, Riots patches fail, stuck at 99%
